channel.title: Cinema 4D?
channel.description: Where do we get C4D for free? I wanna make some stuff im ganna be a Graphic Designer/programer when i get out of college. im in highschool atm. Can someone tell me where?

item.title: Cinema 4D?
item.dc:creator: @casey casey
item.description:
@casey wrote:

ddl2.com
phazeddl.com
kats.ws
thepiratebay.org

just a few of the sites you can get a freeware 3D modeling program at blender.org works like c4d just a bit more complex.

Read full topic

item.title: Cinema 4D?
item.dc:creator: @Uxalis Uxalis
item.description:
@Uxalis wrote:

You could try phazeddl everytime theres a new version out, they have em on there in days.

Read full topic

item.title: Cinema 4D?
item.dc:creator: @grandtheft grandtheft
item.description:
@grandtheft wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:5, topic:8131”]Hi grandtheft. It is nice to know there are people like me about I’m planning to get in to graphics design/advertising/marketing when I’m older. I’m still not 100% sure but It seems like the way I would like to go. If you would like free C4D register to me forum at http://countergfx.x.am . Once you have registered go to the CG Graphics section and you will find a post by SomethingToHide called “What is C4D and How do I get it?” In there he provides you the link to a free C4D

Have fun.[/quote]

Thx sir… and whoever sayed it seems like ad ream for me. Go fuck yourself… i learned Java and Photoshop in a few hours… i learn shit fast…

Read full topic

item.title: Cinema 4D?
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Hi grandtheft. It is nice to know there are people like me about I’m planning to get in to graphics design/advertising/marketing when I’m older. I’m still not 100% sure but It seems like the way I would like to go. If you would like free C4D register to me forum at http://countergfx.x.am . Once you have registered go to the CG Graphics section and you will find a post by SomethingToHide called “What is C4D and How do I get it?” In there he provides you the link to a free C4D

Have fun.

Read full topic

item.title: Cinema 4D?
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

im ganna be a Graphic Designer/programer when i get out of college.

let me get things straight. You have no knowledge of C4D. Your in highschool. You are dead broke. And somehow you know you are going to work on graphics as a profession?
Wow you sound like a little kid whos dream is to one day be an astronaut, or president.

I would try torrents, even though there are few seeders and it is a VERY tedious and slow download.

Read full topic
